## Testing

- [ ] Tested on TrueNAS Core 13
- [ ] Post-install script works correctly
- [ ] Services start automatically
- [ ] Admin portal accessible (if applicable)
- [ ] Plugin can be stopped/started successfully
- [ ] Plugin can be deleted cleanly

## Checklist

- [ ] JSON manifest created and validated
- [ ] Icon added to icons/ directory (PNG, 128x128)
- [ ] Entry added to INDEX file
- [ ] Artifact repository is public and accessible
- [ ] README.md in artifact repository
- [ ] post_install.sh script included
- [ ] ui.json included (if web interface available)
